I'd also like to mention an important article that appears in today's Journal of the AMA in it researchers report that women who took multivitamins for three months before and three months after they conceived had a lower incidence of nervous system birth defects in their babies as compared to women who took no vitamins this study does not prove that the vitamin pills actually prevented the birth defects in their babies but it does make a very good case for visiting your doctor and getting yourself into good shape nutritionally before you get pregnant Brian okay arguing thank you have a good week
